concept.title: Analytics
concept.shortdesc: Analytics implementations though tag management support all of the variables and functions available with a legacy implementation.

conbody.p: For detailed information on implementing Analytics, see the Analytics Implementation Guide.

row.entry: Select one or more report suites to receive the data that is sent by this tag.
(Optional) If you have a secure server URL, provide it here. Leave it blank to default to the non-secure server URL.
Select the character set used by your report suite.
Select the currency code used by your report suite.
If your instance variable name has changed from the default, provide the new variable name.

conbody.p: When a new version of AppMeasurement for JavaScript is release, you are prompted to upgrade the next time you edit.
